levels.description:
Sheathe and <@ba.vdown>stop</> attacking. When next attacked, <@ba.vup>resist</> that damage, deal <@ba.vup>{multi_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical Damage <@ba.vup>{multi_times}</> times to a selected enemy in range, and immediately <@ba.vup>activate</> Talent 2 once.
<@ba.rem>When an enemy is defeated with this skill, skill activates and sheathes again automatically

<@ba.rem>When an enemy is defeated with this skill, skill activates and sheathes again automatically
